跙跙跙

跙字的基本解释

跙
jū
古同“趄”。

跙
jù
〔跙跙〕偏偏跌跌走不动的样子，如“驷马跙跙，而更其御。”

跙
qiè
古同“趄”。斜靠。

跙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jù］
［《廣韻》慈吕切，上語，從。］
(1)行走困难。
(2)见“跙跙”。
[②]［qiè］
［《集韻》七夜切，去禡，清。］
见“跙2足”。

跙字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　跙； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1224第02
【廣韻】慈呂切【集韻】【韻會】在呂切，?音咀。【玉篇】行不進也。【揚子·太?經】四馬跙跙。　又【集韻】狀所切，音齟。義同。　又【集韻】千余切，音疽。趄或作跙。詳走部趄字註。　又淺野切，音且。【類篇】?跙，足利。　又莊助切，音阻。【類篇】行不正也。一曰馬蹄病。或作?。　又【集韻】【類篇】?七夜切，音笡。【類篇】衺足立。

跙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
跙字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Slap
jū
The ancient same "snap".
Slap
jù
〔跙跙] He just stumbles and does not move, such as "The horse is stubborn, but it is more imperious."
Slap
qiè
The ancient same "snap". Lean.
Slap
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jù］
["Guangyun" Ci Luqie, Shangyu, from. ]
(1) Difficulty walking.
(2) See "Lumps".
[②]［qiè］
["Jiyun" Seven nights cut, go to 禡, Qing. ]
See "Lump 2 feet".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Foot Character Department] 　跙; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1224 No. 02
[Guang Yun] Ci Lu Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] In Lu Qi,? Yin Tsui. [Jade articles] Can't make progress. 【Yangtze·Tai? Scripture】Four horses are staggered.　【Jiyun】The zodiac is cut and the sound is different. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] more than a thousand cuts, sound gangrene. Stagger or make a stagger. Follow the note of the Ministry of Letters in detail.　Asano cut again, Otoka. 【Classes】? Climb, Ashikaga.　You Zhuang help cut, sound resistance. 【Classes】Is not working properly. One is horseshoe disease. Or for?.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Seven nights cut, sound 笡. [Class articles] Adachi.
